name: Mad Snake and Block
description:
wipe your finger to guide a snake of balls and break the bricks.
Try to break as many bricks as possible.
Get additional balls and make the biggest snake ever!

Balls vs Blocks game is a classic snake game in which you need to eat balls in order to make your snake bigger. When you crush a block, your snake becomes shorter by a number that was written on the block you hit. So you need to help your snake grow longer and longer. The game never ends.

Very easy to play but very hard to reach high scores!

Game Features:
- Free to play
- Endless gameplay
- Simple swipe control
- Challenge your friends with the best highscore
